trans-unit.source: Authentication policies including packages for OAuth1a and OAuth2.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证策略，包括OAuth1a和OAuth2的软件包。

trans-unit.source: Serialization that supports both ORM and non-ORM data sources.
trans-unit.target: 支持ORM和非ORM数据源的序列化。

trans-unit.source: DRF-Base64 provides a set of field and model serializers that handles the upload of base64-encoded files.
trans-unit.target: DRF-Base64提供了一组字段和模型序列化程序，用于处理base64编码文件的上载。

trans-unit.source: djangorestframework-queryfields allows API clients to specify which fields will be sent in the response via inclusion/exclusion query parameters.
trans-unit.target: djangorestframework-queryfields允许API客户端指定通过包含/排除查询参数在响应中发送哪些字段。

trans-unit.source: Django-rest-knox library provides models and views to handle token based authentication in a more secure and extensible way than the built-in TokenAuthentication scheme - with Single Page Applications and Mobile clients in mind. It provides per-client tokens, and views to generate them when provided some other authentication (usually basic authentication), to delete the token (providing a server enforced logout) and to delete all tokens (logs out all clients that a user is logged into).
trans-unit.target: Django-rest-knox库提供了模型和视图，以比内置TokenAuthentication方案更安全和可扩展的方式处理基于令牌的身份验证-考虑到单页应用程序和移动客户端。它提供了每个客户端令牌，并提供了一些其他身份验证（通常是基本身份验证）以生成令牌，删除令牌（提供服务器强制注销）以及删除所有令牌（注销用户已登录的所有客户端）的视图。 ）。

trans-unit.source: Django Rest Multiple Models provides a generic view (and mixin) for sending multiple serialized models and/or querysets via a single API request.
trans-unit.target: Django Rest Multiple Models提供了通用视图（和混合），用于通过单个API请求发送多个序列化的模型和/或查询集。

trans-unit.source: Django-rest-framework-social-oauth2 library provides an easy way to integrate social plugins (facebook, twitter, google, etc.) to your authentication system and an easy oauth2 setup. With this library, you will be able to authenticate users based on external tokens (e.g. facebook access token), convert these tokens to "in-house" oauth2 tokens and use and generate oauth2 tokens to authenticate your users.
trans-unit.target: Django-rest-framework-social-oauth2库提供了一种将社交插件（facebook，twitter，google等）集成到身份验证系统中的简便方法，并提供了简单的oauth2设置。使用此库，您将能够基于外部令牌（例如，Facebook访问令牌）对用户进行身份验证，将这些令牌转换为“内部” oauth2令牌，并使用并生成oauth2令牌来对用户进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Django-rest-auth library provides a set of REST API endpoints for registration, authentication (including social media authentication), password reset, retrieve and update user details, etc. By having these API endpoints, your client apps such as AngularJS, iOS, Android, and others can communicate to your Django backend site independently via REST APIs for user management.
trans-unit.target: Django-rest-auth库提供了一组REST API端点，用于注册，身份验证（包括社交媒体身份验证），密码重置，检索和更新用户详细信息等。通过拥有这些API端点，您的客户端应用（例如AngularJS，iOS， Android等可以通过REST API独立地与您的Django后端站点进行通信，以进行用户管理。

trans-unit.source: drfpasswordless adds (Medium, Square Cash inspired) passwordless support to Django REST Framework's own TokenAuthentication scheme. Users log in and sign up with a token sent to a contact point like an email address or a mobile number.
trans-unit.target: drfpasswordless为Django REST Framework自己的TokenAuthentication方案增加了（无中号，Square Cash启发）无密码支持。用户登录并使用发送到联系点（如电子邮件地址或手机号码）的令牌进行注册。

trans-unit.source: django-guardian (1.1.1+) - Object level permissions support.
trans-unit.target: django-guardian（1.1.1+）-对象级别权限支持。

trans-unit.source: drf-schema-adapter is a set of tools that makes it easier to provide schema information to frontend frameworks and libraries. It provides a metadata mixin as well as 2 metadata classes and several adapters suitable to generate json-schema as well as schema information readable by various libraries.
trans-unit.target: drf-schema-adapter是一组工具，可以更轻松地向前端框架和库提供架构信息。它提供元数据混合以及2个元数据类和几个适配器，这些适配器适合生成json模式以及各种库可读取的模式信息。

trans-unit.source: decorators.pyviews.py
trans-unit.target: decorators.pyviews.py

trans-unit.source: mixins.pygenerics.py
trans-unit.target: mixins.pygenerics.py

trans-unit.source: UltraJSON is an optimized C JSON encoder which can give significantly faster JSON rendering. Jacob Haslehurst maintains the drf-ujson-renderer package which implements JSON rendering using the UJSON package.
trans-unit.target: UltraJSON是经过优化的C JSON编码器，可以显着加快JSON渲染速度。Jacob Haslehurst维护了drf-ujson-renderer软件包，该软件包使用UJSON软件包实现JSON呈现。

trans-unit.source: MessagePack is a fast, efficient binary serialization format. Juan Riaza maintains the djangorestframework-msgpack package which provides MessagePack renderer and parser support for REST framework.
trans-unit.target: MessagePack是一种快速，高效的二进制序列化格式。Juan Riaza维护djangorestframework-msgpack软件包，该软件包为REST框架提供MessagePack渲染器和解析器支持。

trans-unit.source: drf-url-filter is a simple Django app to apply filters on drf ModelViewSet's Queryset in a clean, simple and configurable way. It also supports validations on incoming query params and their values. A beautiful python package Voluptuous is being used for validations on the incoming query parameters. The best part about voluptuous is you can define your own validations as per your query params requirements.
trans-unit.target: DRF-URL过滤是一个简单的Django应用程序对DRF应用滤镜 ModelViewSet 的 Queryset 在一个清洁，简单和可配置的方式。它还支持对传入查询参数及其值的验证。一个漂亮的python软件包 Voluptuous 用于对传入的查询参数进行验证。关于性感的最好的部分是您可以根据查询参数要求定义自己的验证。

trans-unit.source: django-url-filter provides a safe way to filter data via human-friendly URLs. It works very similar to DRF serializers and fields in a sense that they can be nested except they are called filtersets and filters. That provides easy way to filter related data. Also this library is generic-purpose so it can be used to filter other sources of data and not only Django QuerySets.
trans-unit.target: django-url-filter提供了一种通过人类友好的URL过滤数据的安全方法。从某种意义上说，它可以嵌套，但它们称为过滤器集和过滤器，在某种意义上，它的工作方式与DRF序列化器和字段非常相似。这提供了过滤相关数据的简便方法。该库也是通用的，因此可以用来过滤其他数据源，而不仅仅是Django QuerySet 。

trans-unit.source: Rest Framework Latex provides a renderer that outputs PDFs using Laulatex. It is maintained by Pebble (S/F Software).
trans-unit.target: Rest Framework Latex提供了一个渲染器，该渲染器使用Laulatex输出PDF。它由Pebble（S / F软件）维护。

trans-unit.source: Djoser library provides a set of views to handle basic actions such as registration, login, logout, password reset and account activation. The package works with a custom user model and it uses token based authentication. This is a ready to use REST implementation of Django authentication system.
trans-unit.target: Djoser库提供了一组视图来处理诸如注册，登录，注销，密码重置和帐户激活之类的基本操作。该软件包与自定义用户模型一起使用，并且使用基于令牌的身份验证。这是一个随时可以使用的Django身份验证系统的REST实现。

trans-unit.source: djangorestframework-camel-case provides camel case JSON renderers and parsers for REST framework. This allows serializers to use Python-style underscored field names, but be exposed in the API as Javascript-style camel case field names. It is maintained by Vitaly Babiy.
trans-unit.target: djangorestframework-camel-case提供REST框架的驼峰式 JSON渲染器和解析器。这允许序列化程序使用Python样式的带下划线的字段名称，但在API中以Javascript样式的驼峰式大小写字段名称公开。它由Vitaly Babiy维护。

trans-unit.source: Django REST Pandas provides a serializer and renderers that support additional data processing and output via the Pandas DataFrame API. Django REST Pandas includes renderers for Pandas-style CSV files, Excel workbooks (both .xls and .xlsx), and a number of other formats. It is maintained by S. Andrew Sheppard as part of the wq Project.
trans-unit.target: Django REST Pandas提供了序列化器和渲染器，它们支持通过Pandas DataFrame API进行其他数据处理和输出。Django REST Pandas包括用于Pandas样式CSV文件，Excel工作簿（ .xls 和 .xlsx ）以及许多其他格式的渲染器。它由S. Andrew Sheppard作为wq项目的一部分进行维护。

trans-unit.source: REST framework JSONP provides JSONP rendering support. It was previously included directly in the REST framework package, and is now instead supported as a third-party package.
trans-unit.target: REST框架JSONP提供JSONP渲染支持。它以前直接包含在REST框架程序包中，现在已作为第三方程序包受支持。

trans-unit.source: REST Framework XML provides a simple informal XML format. It was previously included directly in the REST framework package, and is now instead supported as a third-party package.
trans-unit.target: REST Framework XML提供了一种简单的非正式XML格式。它以前直接包含在REST框架程序包中，现在已作为第三方程序包受支持。

trans-unit.source: REST framework YAML provides YAML parsing and rendering support. It was previously included directly in the REST framework package, and is now instead supported as a third-party package.
trans-unit.target: REST框架YAML提供了YAML解析和渲染支持。它以前直接包含在REST框架程序包中，现在已作为第三方程序包受支持。

trans-unit.source: MessagePack is a fast, efficient binary serialization format. Juan Riaza maintains the djangorestframework-msgpack package which provides MessagePack renderer and parser support for REST framework.
trans-unit.target: MessagePack是一种快速，高效的二进制序列化格式。Juan Riaza维护djangorestframework-msgpack软件包，该软件包为REST框架提供MessagePack渲染器和解析器支持。

trans-unit.source: Markdown (3.0.0+) - Markdown support for the browsable API.
trans-unit.target: Markdown（3.0.0+）-对可浏览API的Markdown支持。

trans-unit.source: Pygments (2.4.0+) - Add syntax highlighting to Markdown processing.
trans-unit.target: Pygments（2.4.0+）-在Markdown处理中添加语法突出显示。

trans-unit.source: coreapi (1.32.0+) - Schema generation support.
trans-unit.target: coreapi（1.32.0+）-模式生成支持。

trans-unit.source: django-filter (1.0.1+) - Filtering support.
trans-unit.target: django-filter（1.0.1+）-过滤支持。

trans-unit.source: Extensive documentation, and great community support.
trans-unit.target: 广泛的文档资料和强大的社区支持。

trans-unit.source: 'hex' - The compact hex representation of the UUID, not including hyphens: "5ce0e9a55ffa654bcee01238041fb31a"
trans-unit.target: 'hex' "5ce0e9a55ffa654bcee01238041fb31a" UUID的紧凑十六进制表示形式，不包括连字符：“ 5ce0e9a55ffa654bcee01238041fb31a”

trans-unit.source: 'hex_verbose' - The canonical hex representation, including hyphens: "5ce0e9a5-5ffa-654b-cee0-1238041fb31a"
trans-unit.target: 'hex_verbose' -规范的十六进制表示形式，包括连字符： "5ce0e9a5-5ffa-654b-cee0-1238041fb31a"

trans-unit.source: 'int' - A 128 bit integer representation of the UUID: "123456789012312313134124512351145145114"

'urn' - RFC 4122 URN representation of the UUID: "urn:uuid:5ce0e9a5-5ffa-654b-cee0-1238041fb31a" Changing the format parameters only affects representation values. All formats are accepted by to_internal_value
trans-unit.target: 'urn' "urn:uuid:5ce0e9a5-5ffa-654b-cee0-1238041fb31a" UUID的RFC 4122 URN表示形式：“ urn：uuid：5ce0e9a5-5ffa-654b-cee0-1238041fb31a”更改 format 参数只会影响表示形式值。 to_internal_value 接受所有格式

trans-unit.source: .create() and .update() - Override either or both of these to support saving instances.
trans-unit.target: .create() 和 .update() -覆盖这两者之一或两者以支持保存实例。

trans-unit.source: .data - Returns the outgoing primitive representation.
trans-unit.target: .data -返回传出的原始表示形式。

trans-unit.source: .detail - Return the textual description of the error.
trans-unit.target: .detail -返回错误的文本描述。

trans-unit.source: .errors - Returns any errors during validation.
trans-unit.target: .errors -返回验证期间的任何错误。

trans-unit.source: .get_codes() - Return the code identifier of the error.
trans-unit.target: .get_codes() -返回错误的代码标识符。

trans-unit.source: .get_full_details() - Return both the textual description and the code identifier.
trans-unit.target: .get_full_details() -返回文本描述和代码标识符。

trans-unit.source: .is_valid() - Deserializes and validates incoming data.
trans-unit.target: .is_valid() -反序列化并验证传入的数据。

trans-unit.source: .save() - Persists the validated data into an object instance.
trans-unit.target: .save() -将经过验证的数据保留到对象实例中。

trans-unit.source: .to_internal_value() - Override this to support deserialization, for write operations.

trans-unit.source: ALLOWED_VERSIONS. If set, this value will restrict the set of versions that may be returned by the versioning scheme, and will raise an error if the provided version is not in this set. Note that the value used for the DEFAULT_VERSION setting is always considered to be part of the ALLOWED_VERSIONS set (unless it is None). Defaults to None.
trans-unit.target: ALLOWED_VERSIONS 。如果设置，则此值将限制版本控制方案可能返回的版本集，如果提供的版本不在此版本集中，则将引发错误。请注意，始终将用于 DEFAULT_VERSION 设置的值视为 ALLOWED_VERSIONS 设置的一部分（除非为 None ）。默认为 None 。

trans-unit.source: APIView classes are different from regular View classes in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: APIView 类在以下方面与常规 View 类不同：

trans-unit.source: AnonRateThrottle is suitable if you want to restrict the rate of requests from unknown sources.
trans-unit.target: AnonRateThrottle 如果要限制来自未知源的请求速率，则AnonRateThrottle是合适的。

trans-unit.source: BaseSerializer class that can be used to easily support alternative serialization and deserialization styles.
trans-unit.target: BaseSerializer 类，可用于轻松支持替代的序列化和反序列化样式。

trans-unit.source: DEFAULT_VERSION. The value that should be used for request.version when no versioning information is present. Defaults to None.
trans-unit.target: DEFAULT_VERSION 。不存在版本信息时应用于 request.version 的值。默认为 None 。

trans-unit.source: DELETE requests require the user to have the delete permission on the model instance.
trans-unit.target: DELETE 请求要求用户对模型实例具有 delete 权限。

trans-unit.source: DELETE requests require the user to have the delete permission on the model.
trans-unit.target: DELETE 请求要求用户对模型具有 delete 权限。

trans-unit.source: FileUploadParser respects Django's standard FILE_UPLOAD_HANDLERS setting, and the request.upload_handlers attribute. See the Django documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: FileUploadParser 遵循Django的标准 FILE_UPLOAD_HANDLERS 设置以及 request.upload_handlers 属性。有关更多详细信息，请参见Django文档。

trans-unit.source: HyperlinkedRelatedField may be used to represent the target of the relationship using a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: HyperlinkedRelatedField 可以用于使用超链接表示关系的目标。

trans-unit.source: POST requests require the user to have the add permission on the model instance.
trans-unit.target: POST 请求要求用户对模型实例具有 add 权限。

trans-unit.source: POST requests require the user to have the add permission on the model.
trans-unit.target: POST 请求要求用户对模型具有 add 权限。

trans-unit.source: PUT and PATCH requests require the user to have the change permission on the model instance.
trans-unit.target: PUT 和 PATCH 请求要求用户对模型实例具有 change 权限。

trans-unit.source: PUT and PATCH requests require the user to have the change permission on the model.
trans-unit.target: PUT 和 PATCH 请求要求用户具有对模型的 change 权限。

trans-unit.source: PrimaryKeyRelatedField may be used to represent the target of the relationship using its primary key.
trans-unit.target: PrimaryKeyRelatedField 可以用于使用其主键表示关系的目标。

trans-unit.source: SlugRelatedField may be used to represent the target of the relationship using a field on the target.

trans-unit.source: StringRelatedField may be used to represent the target of the relationship using its __str__ method.

trans-unit.source: UserRateThrottle is suitable if you want simple global rate restrictions per-user.
trans-unit.target: UserRateThrottle 如果您希望每个用户简单的全局速率限制，则UserRateThrottle是合适的。

trans-unit.target: VERSION_PARAM 。任何版本控制参数（例如，媒体类型或URL查询参数）中都应使用的字符串。默认为 'version' 。

trans-unit.source: ViewSet classes are almost the same thing as View classes, except that they provide operations such as read, or update, and not method handlers such as get or put.
trans-unit.target: ViewSet 类与 View 类几乎相同，除了它们提供诸如 read 或 update 之类的操作，而不提供诸如 get 或 put 之类的方法处理程序之外。

trans-unit.source: action - the name of the current action (e.g., list, create).
trans-unit.target: action -当前动作的名称（例如 list ， create ）。

trans-unit.source: allow_blank - If set to True then the empty string should be considered a valid value. If set to False then the empty string is considered invalid and will raise a validation error. Defaults to False.
trans-unit.target: allow_blank -如果设置为 True ，则应将空字符串视为有效值。如果设置为 False ,则空字符串被视为无效，并且将引发验证错误。默认为 False 。

trans-unit.source: allow_empty - Designates if empty dictionaries are allowed.
trans-unit.target: allow_empty -指定是否允许使用空字典。

trans-unit.source: allow_empty - Designates if empty lists are allowed.
trans-unit.target: allow_empty -指定是否允许空列表。

trans-unit.source: allow_empty_file - Designates if empty files are allowed.
trans-unit.target: allow_empty_file -指定是否允许空文件。

trans-unit.source: allow_files - Specifies whether files in the specified location should be included. Default is True. Either this or allow_folders must be True.
trans-unit.target: allow_files -指定是否应包含指定位置的文件。默认值为 True 。这个或 allow_folders 必须为 True 。

trans-unit.source: allow_folders - Specifies whether folders in the specified location should be included. Default is False. Either this or allow_files must be True.
trans-unit.target: allow_folders -指定是否应包含指定位置的文件夹。默认值为 False 。这个或 allow_files 必须为 True 。

trans-unit.source: allow_null - If set to True, the field will accept values of None or the empty string for nullable relationships. Defaults to False.
trans-unit.target: allow_null -如果设置为 True ，则该字段将接受 None 值或可为空的关系的空字符串。默认为 False 。

trans-unit.source: application/json, application/yaml and text/html
trans-unit.target: application/json ， application/yaml 和 text/html

trans-unit.source: authentication_classes: May be used to specify the list of authentication classes that will apply to the schema endpoint. Defaults to settings.DEFAULT_AUTHENTICATION_CLASSES
trans-unit.target: authentication_classes ：可用于指定将应用于模式端点的身份验证类的列表。默认为 settings.DEFAULT_AUTHENTICATION_CLASSES

trans-unit.source: basename - The base to use for the URL names that are created. If unset the basename will be automatically generated based on the queryset attribute of the viewset, if it has one. Note that if the viewset does not include a queryset attribute then you must set basename when registering the viewset.
trans-unit.target: basename -用于创建的URL名称的基础。如果未设置，则基名称将基于视图集的 queryset 属性自动生成（如果有）。请注意，如果视图集不包含 queryset 属性，则在注册视图集时必须设置 basename 。

trans-unit.source: basename - the base to use for the URL names that are created.
trans-unit.target: basename -用于创建的URL名称的基础。

trans-unit.source: binary - If set to True then the field will output and validate a JSON encoded string, rather than a primitive data structure. Defaults to False.
trans-unit.target: binary -如果设置为 True ,则该字段将输出并验证JSON编码的字符串，而不是原始数据结构。默认为 False 。

trans-unit.source: child - A field instance that is used for validating the values in the dictionary. The default child field accepts both empty strings and null values.
trans-unit.target: child -用于验证字典中值的字段实例。默认的子字段接受空字符串和空值。

trans-unit.source: child - A field instance that should be used for validating the values in the dictionary. If this argument is not provided then values in the mapping will not be validated.

trans-unit.source: choices - A list of valid values, or a list of (key, display_name) tuples.
trans-unit.target: choices -有效值列表或 (key, display_name) 元组列表。

trans-unit.source: coerce_to_string Set to True if string values should be returned for the representation, or False if Decimal objects should be returned. Defaults to the same value as the COERCE_DECIMAL_TO_STRING settings key, which will be True unless overridden. If Decimal objects are returned by the serializer, then the final output format will be determined by the renderer. Note that setting localize will force the value to True.
trans-unit.target: coerce_to_string 设置为 True 如果字符串值应为返回的表示，或 False 如果 Decimal 应返回的对象。默认值为与 COERCE_DECIMAL_TO_STRING 设置键相同的值，除非被覆盖，否则为 True 。如果串行器返回 Decimal 对象，则最终输出格式将由渲染器确定。请注意，设置 localize 会将值强制设置为 True 。

trans-unit.source: content_type: The content type of the response. Typically, this will be set automatically by the renderer as determined by content negotiation, but there may be some cases where you need to specify the content type explicitly.
trans-unit.target: content_type ：响应的内容类型。通常，这将由呈现器根据内容协商确定自动设置，但是在某些情况下，您需要显式指定内容类型。

trans-unit.source: cursor_query_param = A string value indicating the name of the "cursor" query parameter. Defaults to 'cursor'.
trans-unit.target: cursor_query_param =一个字符串值，指示“游标”查询参数的名称。默认为 'cursor' 。

trans-unit.source: data: The serialized data for the response.
trans-unit.target: data ：响应的序列化数据。

trans-unit.source: date_fieldrequired - A field name which will be used to determine date range for the uniqueness constrain. This must exist as a field on the serializer class.
trans-unit.target: date_field 必需 -一个字段名称，将用于确定唯一性约束的日期范围。它必须作为序列化程序类上的字段存在。

trans-unit.source: decimal_places The number of decimal places to store with the number.

trans-unit.source: default_limit - A numeric value indicating the limit to use if one is not provided by the client in a query parameter. Defaults to the same value as the PAGE_SIZE settings key.
trans-unit.target: default_limit -一个数值，指示客户端未在查询参数中提供限制时使用的限制。默认值与 PAGE_SIZE 设置键相同。

trans-unit.source: default_timezone - A pytz.timezone representing the timezone. If not specified and the USE_TZ setting is enabled, this defaults to the current timezone. If USE_TZ is disabled, then datetime objects will be naive.
trans-unit.target: default_timezone -表示时区的 pytz.timezone 。如果未指定并且启用了 USE_TZ 设置，则默认为当前时区。如果禁用 USE_TZ ，则日期时间对象将是幼稚的。

trans-unit.target: django_paginator_class -要使用的Django Paginator类。默认值为 django.core.paginator.Paginator ，在大多数情况下都可以使用。

trans-unit.target: encoder -使用此JSON编码器序列化输入对象。默认为 None 。

trans-unit.source: exc: The exception.

trans-unit.target: filter_backends -应该用于过滤查询集的过滤器后端类的列表。默认值为与 DEFAULT_FILTER_BACKENDS 设置相同的值。

Setting to a format string indicates that to_representation return values should be coerced to string output. Format strings are described below. Setting this value to None indicates that Python datetime objects should be returned by to_representation. In this case the datetime encoding will be determined by the renderer.
trans-unit.target: format -表示输出格式的字符串。如果未指定，则默认为与 DATETIME_FORMAT 设置键相同的值，除非设置，否则将为 'iso-8601' 。设置为格式字符串表示将 to_representation 返回值强制转换为字符串输出。格式字符串如下所述。将此值设置为 None 表示 to_representation 应该返回Python datetime 对象。在这种情况下，日期时间编码将由渲染器确定。

trans-unit.source: format - A string representing the output format. If not specified, this defaults to the same value as the DATE_FORMAT settings key, which will be 'iso-8601' unless set. Setting to a format string indicates that to_representation return values should be coerced to string output. Format strings are described below. Setting this value to None indicates that Python date objects should be returned by to_representation. In this case the date encoding will be determined by the renderer.
trans-unit.target: format -表示输出格式的字符串。如果未指定，则默认为与 DATE_FORMAT 设置键相同的值，除非设置，否则为 'iso-8601' 。设置为格式字符串表示将 to_representation 返回值强制转换为字符串输出。格式字符串如下所述。将此值设置为 None 表示 to_representation 应该返回Python date 对象。在这种情况下，日期编码将由渲染器确定。

Setting this value to None indicates that Python time objects should be returned by to_representation. In this case the time encoding will be determined by the renderer.

trans-unit.source: html_cutoff - If set this will be the maximum number of choices that will be displayed by a HTML select drop down. Can be used to ensure that automatically generated ChoiceFields with very large possible selections do not prevent a template from rendering. Defaults to None.
trans-unit.target: html_cutoff -如果设置，则将是HTML select下拉列表将显示的最大选择数。可以用于确保自动生成的ChoiceFields（具有非常大的可能选择）不会阻止模板的呈现。默认为 None 。

trans-unit.source: html_cutoff - If set this will be the maximum number of choices that will be displayed by a HTML select drop down. Set to None to disable any limiting. Defaults to 1000.

trans-unit.source: input_formats - A list of strings representing the input formats which may be used to parse the date. If not specified, the DATETIME_INPUT_FORMATS setting will be used, which defaults to ['iso-8601'].
trans-unit.target: input_formats -代表可用于解析日期的输入格式的字符串列表。如果未指定，将使用 DATETIME_INPUT_FORMATS 设置，默认设置为 ['iso-8601'] 。

trans-unit.source: input_formats - A list of strings representing the input formats which may be used to parse the date. If not specified, the DATE_INPUT_FORMATS setting will be used, which defaults to ['iso-8601'].
trans-unit.target: input_formats -代表可用于解析日期的输入格式的字符串列表。如果未指定，将使用 DATE_INPUT_FORMATS 设置，默认设置为 ['iso-8601'] 。

trans-unit.source: input_formats - A list of strings representing the input formats which may be used to parse the date. If not specified, the TIME_INPUT_FORMATS setting will be used, which defaults to ['iso-8601'].

trans-unit.source: localize Set to True to enable localization of input and output based on the current locale. This will also force coerce_to_string to True. Defaults to False. Note that data formatting is enabled if you have set USE_L10N=True in your settings file.
trans-unit.target: localize 设置为 True 以启用基于当前语言环境的输入和输出的本地化。这也将迫使 coerce_to_string 为 True 。默认为 False 。请注意，如果您在设置文件中设置 USE_L10N=True ，则启用数据格式化。

trans-unit.source: lookup - The lookup used to find an existing instance with the value being validated. Defaults to 'exact'.
trans-unit.target: lookup -用于查找具有已验证值的现有实例的查找。默认为 'exact' 。

trans-unit.source: lookup_field - The field on the target that should be used for the lookup. Should correspond to a URL keyword argument on the referenced view. Default is 'pk'.
trans-unit.target: lookup_field -目标上应用于查找的字段。应对应于引用视图上的URL关键字参数。默认是 'pk' 。

trans-unit.source: lookup_field - The model field that should be used to for performing object lookup of individual model instances. Defaults to 'pk'. Note that when using hyperlinked APIs you'll need to ensure that both the API views and the serializer classes set the lookup fields if you need to use a custom value.
trans-unit.target: lookup_field -用于对单个模型实例执行对象查找的模型字段。默认为 'pk' 。需要注意的是使用超链接的API时，您需要确保双方的API意见和串行类设置查找字段，如果你需要使用一个自定义值。

trans-unit.source: lookup_url_kwarg - The URL keyword argument that should be used for object lookup. The URL conf should include a keyword argument corresponding to this value. If unset this defaults to using the same value as lookup_field.
trans-unit.target: lookup_url_kwarg -应该用于对象查找的URL关键字参数。URL conf应包含与此值相对应的关键字参数。如果未设置，则默认使用与 lookup_field 相同的值。

trans-unit.source: lookup_url_kwarg - The name of the keyword argument defined in the URL conf that corresponds to the lookup field. Defaults to using the same value as lookup_field.
trans-unit.target: lookup_url_kwarg -URL conf中与查找字段相对应的关键字参数的名称。默认使用与 lookup_field 相同的值。

trans-unit.source: many - If applied to a to-many relationship, you should set this argument to True.
trans-unit.target: many -如果应用于多对多关系，则应将此参数设置为 True 。

trans-unit.source: match - A regular expression, as a string, that FilePathField will use to filter filenames.

trans-unit.source: max_length - Designates the maximum length for the file name.

trans-unit.source: max_length - Validates that the input contains no more than this number of characters.

trans-unit.source: max_limit - If set this is a numeric value indicating the maximum allowable limit that may be requested by the client. Defaults to None.
trans-unit.target: max_limit -如果设置，则为一个数字值，指示客户端可能请求的最大允许限制。默认为 None 。

trans-unit.source: max_page_size - If set, this is a numeric value indicating the maximum allowable requested page size. This attribute is only valid if page_size_query_param is also set.
trans-unit.target: max_page_size -如果设置，则是一个数字值，指示请求的最大允许页面大小。仅当还设置了 page_size_query_param 时,此属性才有效。

trans-unit.source: max_value Validate that the duration provided is no greater than this value.

trans-unit.source: max_value Validate that the number provided is no greater than this value.

trans-unit.source: ordering = This should be a string, or list of strings, indicating the field against which the cursor based pagination will be applied. For example: ordering = 'slug'. Defaults to -created. This value may also be overridden by using OrderingFilter on the view.
trans-unit.target: ordering =这应该是一个字符串或字符串列表，指示将基于游标的分页应用于的字段。例如： ordering = 'slug' 。默认为 -created 。通过在视图上使用 OrderingFilter 也可以覆盖此值。

trans-unit.source: page_query_param - A string value indicating the name of the query parameter to use for the pagination control.
trans-unit.target: page_query_param -一个字符串值，指示用于分页控件的查询参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: page_size - A numeric value indicating the page size. If set, this overrides the PAGE_SIZE setting. Defaults to the same value as the PAGE_SIZE settings key.
trans-unit.target: page_size -一个数字值，指示页面大小。如果已设置， PAGE_SIZE 覆盖PAGE_SIZE设置。默认值与 PAGE_SIZE 设置键相同。

trans-unit.source: page_size = A numeric value indicating the page size. If set, this overrides the PAGE_SIZE setting. Defaults to the same value as the PAGE_SIZE settings key.

trans-unit.source: page_size_query_param - If set, this is a string value indicating the name of a query parameter that allows the client to set the page size on a per-request basis. Defaults to None, indicating that the client may not control the requested page size.
trans-unit.target: page_size_query_param -如果设置，则是一个字符串值，指示允许客户端基于每个请求设置页面大小的查询参数的名称。默认为 None ，表示客户端可能无法控制请求的页面大小。

trans-unit.source: pk_field - Set to a field to control serialization/deserialization of the primary key's value. For example, pk_field=UUIDField(format='hex') would serialize a UUID primary key into its compact hex representation.
trans-unit.target: pk_field -设置为一个字段以控制主键值的序列化/反序列化。例如， pk_field=UUIDField(format='hex') 会将UUID主键序列化为其紧凑的十六进制表示形式。

trans-unit.source: queryset - The queryset that should be used for returning objects from this view. Typically, you must either set this attribute, or override the get_queryset() method. If you are overriding a view method, it is important that you call get_queryset() instead of accessing this property directly, as queryset will get evaluated once, and those results will be cached for all subsequent requests.
trans-unit.target: queryset -用于从该视图返回对象的查询集。通常，您必须设置此属性，或重写 get_queryset() 方法。如果要覆盖视图方法，则必须调用 get_queryset() 而不是直接访问此属性，这一点很重要，因为 queryset 将被评估一次，并且那些结果将为所有后续请求缓存。

trans-unit.source: Note: Don't forget that authentication by itself won't allow or disallow an incoming request, it simply identifies the credentials that the request was made with.
trans-unit.target: 注意：不要忘了身份验证本身不会允许或不允许传入的请求，它只会标识发出请求的凭据。

trans-unit.source: Note: If a client sends malformed content, then accessing request.data may raise a ParseError. By default REST framework's APIView class or @api_view decorator will catch the error and return a 400 Bad Request response.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果客户端发送格式错误的内容，则访问 request.data 可能会引发 ParseError 。默认情况下，REST框架的 APIView 类或 @api_view 装饰器将捕获该错误并返回 400 Bad Request 响应。

trans-unit.source: Note: If you use BasicAuthentication in production you must ensure that your API is only available over https. You should also ensure that your API clients will always re-request the username and password at login, and will never store those details to persistent storage.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果在生产中使用 BasicAuthentication ，则必须确保您的API仅可通过 https 获得。您还应该确保API客户端始终在登录时重新请求用户名和密码，并且永远不会将这些详细信息存储到持久性存储中。

trans-unit.source: Note: If you use TokenAuthentication in production you must ensure that your API is only available over https.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果在生产中使用 TokenAuthentication ，则必须确保您的API仅可通过 https 获得。

trans-unit.source: Note: If you want to use a different keyword in the header, such as Bearer, simply subclass TokenAuthentication and set the keyword class variable.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果要在标头中使用其他关键字（例如 Bearer )，则只需对 TokenAuthentication 进行子类化并设置 keyword class变量。

trans-unit.source: Note: If your <field_name> is declared on your serializer with the parameter required=False then this validation step will not take place if the field is not included.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果在序列化器上使用参数 required=False 声明了 <field_name> ,那么如果不包括该字段，则不会执行此验证步骤。

trans-unit.target: 注意：请确保在更改设置后运行 manage.py migrate 。该 rest_framework.authtoken 应用程序提供Django的数据库迁移。

trans-unit.target: 注意：关系字段是在 relations.py 中声明的，但是按照惯例，您应该使用 from rest_framework import serializers 从 serializers 模块导入它们，并将字段称为 serializers.<FieldName> 。

trans-unit.source: Note: When your custom authenticator is invoked by the request object's .user or .auth properties, you may see an AttributeError re-raised as a WrappedAttributeError. This is necessary to prevent the original exception from being suppressed by the outer property access. Python will not recognize that the AttributeError originates from your custom authenticator and will instead assume that the request object does not have a .user or .auth property. These errors should be fixed or otherwise handled by your authenticator.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当您的自定义身份验证器由请求对象的 .user 或 .auth 属性调用时，您可能会看到 AttributeError 重新引发为 WrappedAttributeError 。这对于防止原始异常被外部属性访问抑制是必要的。 Python将不会识别 AttributeError 源自您的自定义身份验证器，而是会假设请求对象没有 .user 或 .auth 属性。这些错误应由验证者修复或以其他方式处理。

trans-unit.source: Note: You may see a WrappedAttributeError raised when calling the .user or .auth properties. These errors originate from an authenticator as a standard AttributeError, however it's necessary that they be re-raised as a different exception type in order to prevent them from being suppressed by the outer property access. Python will not recognize that the AttributeError originates from the authenticator and will instead assume that the request object does not have a .user or .auth property. The authenticator will need to be fixed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：调用 .user 或 .auth 属性时，您可能会看到 WrappedAttributeError 引发。这些错误源自作为标准 AttributeError 的身份验证器，但是有必要将它们重新引发为不同的异常类型，以防止外部属性访问抑制它们。Python将不会识别 AttributeError 源自身份验证器，而是会假设请求对象没有 .user 或 .auth 属性。身份验证器将需要固定。

trans-unit.source: Note: it supports & (and), | (or) and ~ (not).
trans-unit.target: 注意：它支持＆（和），|。（或）和〜（不是）。

trans-unit.source: Note: For basic APIView subclasses, default introspection is essentially limited to the URL kwarg path parameters. For GenericAPIView subclasses, which includes all the provided class based views, AutoSchema will attempt to introspect serialiser, pagination and filter fields, as well as provide richer path field descriptions. (The key hooks here are the relevant GenericAPIView attributes and methods: get_serializer, pagination_class, filter_backends and so on.)
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于基本的 APIView 子类，默认自省实际上仅限于URL kwarg路径参数。对于 GenericAPIView 子类，其中包括所有提供的基于类的视图， AutoSchema 将尝试内省序列化程序，分页和过滤器字段，并提供更丰富的路径字段描述。（这里的关键钩子是相关的 GenericAPIView 属性和方法： get_serializer ， pagination_class ， filter_backends 等。）

trans-unit.source: Note: If you need object level view permissions for GET, HEAD and OPTIONS requests and are using django-guardian for your object-level permissions backend, you'll want to consider using the DjangoObjectPermissionsFilter class provided by the djangorestframework-guardian package. It ensures that list endpoints only return results including objects for which the user has appropriate view permissions.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您需要 GET ， HEAD 和 OPTIONS 请求的对象级 view 权限，并且正在将django-guardian用于对象级权限后端，则需要考虑使用 djangorestframework-guardian 包提供的 DjangoObjectPermissionsFilter 类。它确保列表端点仅返回结果，包括用户具有相应查看权限的对象。

trans-unit.source: Note: It's worth noting that Django's standard RequestFactory doesn't need to include this option, because when using regular Django the CSRF validation takes place in middleware, which is not run when testing views directly. When using REST framework, CSRF validation takes place inside the view, so the request factory needs to disable view-level CSRF checks.
trans-unit.target: 注意：值得注意的是，Django的标准 RequestFactory 不需要包含此选项，因为在使用常规Django时，CSRF验证在中间件中进行，而中间件在直接测试视图时不会运行。使用REST框架时，CSRF验证在视图内部进行，因此请求工厂需要禁用视图级CSRF检查。

trans-unit.source: Note: The UniqueFor<Range>Validator classes impose an implicit constraint that the fields they are applied to are always treated as required. Fields with default values are an exception to this as they always supply a value even when omitted from user input.
trans-unit.target: 注意： UniqueFor<Range>Validator 类强加了一个隐式约束，即始终将应用它们的字段视为必需字段。带有 default 值的字段是一个例外，因为即使从用户输入中省略，它们也始终提供一个值。

trans-unit.source: Note: The UniqueTogetherValidator class always imposes an implicit constraint that all the fields it applies to are always treated as required. Fields with default values are an exception to this as they always supply a value even when omitted from user input.
trans-unit.target: 注意： UniqueTogetherValidator 类始终强加一个隐式约束，该约束应用于它的所有字段始终按要求处理。带有 default 值的字段是一个例外，因为即使从用户输入中省略，它们也始终提供一个值。

trans-unit.source: Note: The instance-level has_object_permission method will only be called if the view-level has_permission checks have already passed. Also note that in order for the instance-level checks to run, the view code should explicitly call .check_object_permissions(request, obj). If you are using the generic views then this will be handled for you by default. (Function-based views will need to check object permissions explicitly, raising PermissionDenied on failure.)
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅在视图级别的 has_permission 检查已经通过的情况下，才会调用实例级别的 has_object_permission 方法。还要注意，为了运行实例级检查，视图代码应显式调用 .check_object_permissions(request, obj) 。如果您使用的是通用视图，则默认情况下会为您处理。 （基于功能的视图将需要显式检查对象权限，并在失败时引发 PermissionDenied 。）

trans-unit.source: Tip: Properly matching together hyperlinked representations and your URL conf can sometimes be a bit fiddly. Printing the repr of a HyperlinkedModelSerializer instance is a particularly useful way to inspect exactly which view names and lookup fields the relationships are expected to map too.

trans-unit.source: A format string that should be used by default for rendering the output of DateField serializer fields. If None, then DateField serializer fields will return Python date objects, and the date encoding will be determined by the renderer.

trans-unit.source: A format string that should be used by default for rendering the output of DateTimeField serializer fields. If None, then DateTimeField serializer fields will return Python datetime objects, and the datetime encoding will be determined by the renderer.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下应使用一种格式字符串来呈现 DateTimeField 序列化程序字段的输出。如果为 None ，则 DateTimeField 序列化器字段将返回Python datetime 对象，并且datetime编码将由渲染器确定。

trans-unit.source: A format string that should be used by default for rendering the output of TimeField serializer fields. If None, then TimeField serializer fields will return Python time objects, and the time encoding will be determined by the renderer.

trans-unit.source: A generic field that can be tied to any arbitrary model field. The ModelField class delegates the task of serialization/deserialization to its associated model field. trans-unit.source: Allowing PUT as create operations is problematic, as it necessarily exposes information about the existence or non-existence of objects. It's also not obvious that transparently allowing re-creating of previously deleted instances is necessarily a better default behavior than simply returning 404 responses.
trans-unit.target: 允许 PUT 作为创建操作是有问题的，因为它必须公开有关对象存在或不存在的信息。与仅返回 404 响应相比，透明地允许重新创建先前删除的实例必然是更好的默认行为，这也不是显而易见的。

trans-unit.source: Also keep in mind that with complex cases it can often be better to explicitly define your serializer classes, rather than relying on the default ModelSerializer behavior. This involves a little more code, but ensures that the resulting behavior is more transparent.
trans-unit.target: 还要记住，在复杂的情况下，通常最好显式定义您的序列化器类，而不是依赖于默认的 ModelSerializer 行为。这涉及更多代码，但可以确保结果行为更加透明。

trans-unit.source: As REST framework's Request extends Django's HttpRequest, all the other standard attributes and methods are also available. For example the request.META and request.session dictionaries are available as normal.
trans-unit.target: 随着REST框架的 Request 扩展了Django的 HttpRequest ，所有其他标准属性和方法也都可用。例如， request.META 和 request.session 字典可以正常使用。

trans-unit.source: As a rule, it's probably better practice to return absolute URIs from your Web APIs, such as http://example.com/foobar, rather than returning relative URIs, such as /foobar.
trans-unit.target: 通常，最好从Web API返回绝对URI（例如 http://example.com/foobar )，而不是返回相对URI（例如 /foobar )。

trans-unit.source: As an example of how REST framework uses explicit validation, we'll take a simple model class that has a field with a uniqueness constraint.

trans-unit.source: As usual CSRF validation will only apply to any session authenticated views. This means CSRF validation will only occur if the client has been logged in by calling login().
trans-unit.target: 与往常一样，CSRF验证仅适用于任何经过会话身份验证的视图。这意味着仅当通过调用 login() 登录客户端后，CSRF验证才会发生。

trans-unit.source: As well as allowing clients to perform searches and filtering, generic filter backends can be useful for restricting which objects should be visible to any given request or user.
trans-unit.target: 除了允许客户端执行搜索和过滤外,通用过滤器后端还可以用来限制哪些对象应该对任何给定的请求或用户可见。

trans-unit.source: As well as being able to override the default queryset, REST framework also includes support for generic filtering backends that allow you to easily construct complex searches and filters.
trans-unit.target: 除了能够覆盖默认的查询集,REST框架还包括对通用过滤后端的支持,允许您轻松构建复杂的搜索和过滤器。

trans-unit.source: As well as global permissions, that are run against all incoming requests, you can also create object-level permissions, that are only run against operations that affect a particular object instance. For example:
trans-unit.target: 除了针对所有传入请求运行的全局权限外,您还可以创建对象级权限,该权限仅针对影响特定对象实例的操作运行。比如说,你可以创建对象级的权限,只针对影响特定对象实例的操作运行。

trans-unit.source: As with ChoiceField, both the allow_blank and allow_null options are valid, although it is highly recommended that you only use one and not both. allow_blank should be preferred for textual choices, and allow_null should be preferred for numeric or other non-textual choices.
trans-unit.target: 与 ChoiceField 一样， allow_blank 和 allow_null 选项都有效，尽管强烈建议您仅使用一个，而不要同时使用。 allow_blank 应当优选用于文本选择，以及 allow_null 应当优选用于数字或其他非文本的选择。

trans-unit.source: As with DjangoModelPermissions you can use custom model permissions by overriding DjangoObjectPermissions and setting the .perms_map property. Refer to the source code for details.
trans-unit.target: 与 DjangoModelPermissions 一样,您可以通过覆盖 DjangoObjectPermissions 并设置 .perms_map 属性来使用自定义模型权限。有关详细信息，请参考源代码。

trans-unit.source: As with DjangoModelPermissions, this permission must only be applied to views that have a .queryset property or .get_queryset() method. Authorization will only be granted if the user is authenticated and has the relevant per-object permissions and relevant model permissions assigned.
trans-unit.target: 与 DjangoModelPermissions 一样，此权限必须仅应用于具有 .queryset 属性或 .get_queryset() 方法的视图。仅当用户通过身份验证并分配了相关的每个对象权限和相关的模型权限后，才会授予授权。

trans-unit.source: As with any other TemplateResponse, this method is called to render the serialized data of the response into the final response content. When .render() is called, the response content will be set to the result of calling the .render(data, accepted_media_type, renderer_context) method on the accepted_renderer instance.
trans-unit.target: 与其他任何 TemplateResponse 一样，将调用此方法以将响应的序列化数据呈现为最终响应内容。当 .render() 被调用时，响应内容将被设置为调用的结果 .render(data, accepted_media_type, renderer_context) 上的方法 accepted_renderer 实例。

trans-unit.source: As with permissions and authentication, throttling in REST framework is always defined as a list of classes.
trans-unit.target: 与权限和认证一样,REST框架中的节制总是被定义为一个类的列表。

trans-unit.source: As with permissions, multiple throttles may be used. Your API might have a restrictive throttle for unauthenticated requests, and a less restrictive throttle for authenticated requests.
trans-unit.target: 与权限一样,可以使用多个节流阀。你的API可能对未认证的请求有一个限制性的节制,而对已认证的请求有一个限制性较小的节制。

trans-unit.source: Authentication

trans-unit.source: Authentication is always run at the very start of the view, before the permission and throttling checks occur, and before any other code is allowed to proceed.
trans-unit.target: 认证总是在视图开始时运行,在权限和节流检查发生之前,以及在任何其他代码被允许进行之前。

trans-unit.source: Authentication is the mechanism of associating an incoming request with a set of identifying credentials, such as the user the request came from, or the token that it was signed with. The permission and throttling policies can then use those credentials to determine if the request should be permitted.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证是一种将传入请求与一组标识凭据（例如，请求来自的用户或与之签名的令牌）相关联的机制。然后，权限和限制策略可以使用这些凭据来确定是否应允许该请求。

trans-unit.source: Authentication or identification by itself is not usually sufficient to gain access to information or code. For that, the entity requesting access must have authorization.
trans-unit.target: 认证或识别本身通常不足以获得信息或密码。为此,要求获取信息的实体必须获得授权。

trans-unit.source: Because of this more explicit style REST framework includes a few validator classes that are not available in core Django. These classes are detailed below.
trans-unit.target: 由于这种更明确的风格,REST框架包含了一些核心Django中没有的验证器类。下面详细介绍这些类。

trans-unit.source: Because the API chooses the content type of the response based on the client request, it will, by default, return an HTML-formatted representation of the resource when that resource is requested by a web browser. This allows for the API to return a fully web-browsable HTML representation.
trans-unit.target: 因为API根据客户端请求选择响应的内容类型,所以当Web浏览器请求资源时,它将默认返回该资源的HTML格式化表示。这样,API就可以返回一个完全可网络浏览的HTML表示。

trans-unit.source: Because the behavior of nested creates and updates can be ambiguous, and may require complex dependencies between related models, REST framework 3 requires you to always write these methods explicitly. The default ModelSerializer.create() and .update() methods do not include support for writable nested representations.
trans-unit.target: 由于嵌套创建和更新的行为可能是模棱两可的，并且可能需要相关模型之间的复杂依赖性，因此REST框架3要求您始终明确地编写这些方法。默认的 ModelSerializer .create() 和 .update() 方法不包括对可写嵌套表示的支持。

trans-unit.source: Because the serializers have been fundamentally redesigned with 3.0 this API no longer exists. You can still modify the fields that get created but you'll need to refer to the source code, and be aware that if the changes you make are against private bits of API then they may be subject to change.
trans-unit.target: 因为序列化器已经在3.0中进行了根本性的重新设计,这个API已经不存在了。你仍然可以修改被创建的字段,但你需要参考源代码,并注意如果你所做的更改是针对API的私有部分,那么它们可能会被更改。

trans-unit.source: Because this class provides the same interface as the Serializer class, you can use it with the existing generic class-based views exactly as you would for a regular Serializer or ModelSerializer.
trans-unit.target: 因为此类提供与 Serializer 类相同的接口，所以您可以将其与现有的基于通用类的视图一起使用，就像使用常规 Serializer 或 ModelSerializer 一样。

trans-unit.source: Because we now have a set of permissions on the API, we need to authenticate our requests to it if we want to edit any snippets. We haven't set up any authentication classes, so the defaults are currently applied, which are SessionAuthentication and BasicAuthentication.
trans-unit.target: 由于我们现在对API具有一组权限，因此，如果要编辑任何代码段，就需要对它的请求进行身份验证。我们尚未设置任何身份验证类，因此当前应用了默认值，即 SessionAuthentication 和 BasicAuthentication 。

trans-unit.source: Because we're using ViewSet classes rather than View classes, we actually don't need to design the URL conf ourselves. The conventions for wiring up resources into views and urls can be handled automatically, using a Router class. All we need to do is register the appropriate view sets with a router, and let it do the rest.
trans-unit.target: 因为我们使用的是 ViewSet 类而不是 View 类，所以实际上我们不需要自己设计URL conf。使用 Router 类可以自动处理将资源连接到视图和url的约定。我们需要做的就是向路由器注册适当的视图集，然后让其余的工作完成。

trans-unit.source: Because we're using viewsets instead of views, we can automatically generate the URL conf for our API, by simply registering the viewsets with a router class.
trans-unit.target: 因为我们使用的是viewsets而不是views,所以我们可以为我们的API自动生成URL conf,只需用路由器类注册viewsets即可。

trans-unit.source: Because we've included format suffixed URLs such as '.json', we also need to indicate on the highlight field that any format suffixed hyperlinks it returns should use the '.html' suffix.
trans-unit.target: 因为我们已经包含了带有格式后缀的URL，例如 '.json' ，所以我们还需要在 highlight 字段中指出它返回的任何带有格式后缀的超链接都应使用 '.html' 后缀。

trans-unit.source: Before a TemplateResponse instance can be returned to the client, it must be rendered. The rendering process takes the intermediate representation of template and context, and turns it into the final byte stream that can be served to the client.
trans-unit.target: 在将TemplateResponse实例返回给客户端之前,必须对其进行渲染。渲染过程将模板和上下文的中间表示法,并将其转化为最终的字节流,以提供给客户端。

trans-unit.source: Before running the main body of the view each permission in the list is checked. If any permission check fails an exceptions.PermissionDenied or exceptions.NotAuthenticated exception will be raised, and the main body of the view will not run.
trans-unit.target: 在运行视图主体之前，将检查列表中的每个权限。如果任何权限检查失败，将引发 exceptions.PermissionDenied 或 exceptions.NotAuthenticated 异常，并且视图主体将不运行。

trans-unit.source: Before running the main body of the view each throttle in the list is checked. If any throttle check fails an exceptions.Throttled exception will be raised, and the main body of the view will not run.
trans-unit.target: 在运行视图主体之前，请检查列表中的每个油门。如果任何油门检查失败，则将引发异常，将引发被限制的 exceptions.Throttled ，并且视图主体将不运行。

trans-unit.source: Before we do anything else we'll create a new virtual environment, using venv. This will make sure our package configuration is kept nicely isolated from any other projects we're working on.
trans-unit.target: 在执行其他任何操作之前，我们将使用venv创建一个新的虚拟环境。这将确保我们的程序包配置与我们正在处理的任何其他项目保持良好的隔离。

trans-unit.source: Before we go any further we'll familiarize ourselves with using our new Serializer class. Let's drop into the Django shell.
trans-unit.target: 在我们继续之前,我们先熟悉一下新的Serializer类的使用。让我们进入Django shell。

trans-unit.source: Binding ViewSets to URLs explicitly
trans-unit.target: 明确地将ViewSets绑定到URL上。

trans-unit.target: BooleanField

trans-unit.source: Both URLPathVersioning and NamespaceVersioning are reasonable if you just need a simple versioning scheme. The URLPathVersioning approach might be better suitable for small ad-hoc projects, and the NamespaceVersioning is probably easier to manage for larger projects.
trans-unit.target: 无论 URLPathVersioning 和 NamespaceVersioning 是合理的，如果你只需要一个简单的版本控制方案。该 URLPathVersioning 方法可能更适合于小型特设项目，以及 NamespaceVersioning 可能是更容易管理大型项目。

trans-unit.source: Both of these come with a trade-off. Using regular views and URL confs is more explicit and gives you more control. ViewSets are helpful if you want to get up and running quickly, or when you have a large API and you want to enforce a consistent URL configuration throughout.
trans-unit.target: 这两种方式都有一个权衡。使用常规的视图和URL confs更明确,并给你更多的控制。如果你想快速启动和运行,或者当你有一个大型的API,并且你想在整个过程中强制执行一致的URL配置时,ViewSets很有帮助。

trans-unit.source: Both styles "PUT as 404" and "PUT as create" can be valid in different circumstances, but from version 3.0 onwards we now use 404 behavior as the default, due to it being simpler and more obvious.
trans-unit.target: “ PUT as 404”和“ PUT as create” 这两种样式在不同情况下都可以有效，但是从3.0版开始，由于它更简单，更明显，现在我们将404行为用作默认行为。

trans-unit.source: Both styles conform to RFC 4627, and are syntactically valid JSON. The unicode style is preferred as being more user-friendly when inspecting API responses.
trans-unit.target: 两种样式均符合RFC 4627，并且在语法上均是有效的JSON。首选unicode样式，因为它在检查API响应时更加用户友好。

trans-unit.source: Both the .create() and .update() methods are optional. You can implement either neither, one, or both of them, depending on the use-case for your serializer class.
trans-unit.target: 无论是 .create() 和 .update() 方法是可选的。根据序列化程序类的用例，您既可以实现它们，也可以不实现它们之一，或两者都实现。

trans-unit.source: Both the allow_blank and allow_null are valid options on ChoiceField, although it is highly recommended that you only use one and not both. allow_blank should be preferred for textual choices, and allow_null should be preferred for numeric or other non-textual choices.
trans-unit.target: 无论是 allow_blank 和 allow_null 上有效的选项 ChoiceField ，虽然它是强烈建议您只使用一个，而不是两个。 allow_blank 应当优选用于文本选择，以及 allow_null 应当优选用于数字或其他非文本的选择。

trans-unit.target: Browsability

trans-unit.target: BrowsableAPIRenderer

trans-unit.target: 浏览器改进

trans-unit.source: Browser-based PUT, PATCH and DELETE forms are transparently supported.
trans-unit.target: 透明地支持基于浏览器的 PUT ， PATCH 和 DELETE 表单。

trans-unit.target: 浏览API

trans-unit.source: But we also get the built-in validation for free:
trans-unit.target: 但我们还可以免费获得内置的验证。

trans-unit.source: By convention you should import the serializers module and use a fully qualified ValidationError style, in order to differentiate it from Django's built-in validation error. For example. raise serializers.ValidationError('This field must be an integer value.')
trans-unit.target: 按照惯例，您应该导入序列化器模块并使用完全限定的 ValidationError 样式，以便将其与Django的内置验证错误区分开。例如。 raise serializers.ValidationError('This field must be an integer value.')

trans-unit.source: By creating your own base ViewSet classes, you can provide common behavior that can be reused in multiple viewsets across your API.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建自己的基本 ViewSet 类，可以提供可以在整个API的多个视图集中重用的常见行为。

trans-unit.source: By default "unique together" validation enforces that all fields be required=True. In some cases, you might want to explicit apply required=False to one of the fields, in which case the desired behaviour of the validation is ambiguous.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，“唯一在一起”验证将强制所有字段为 required=True 。在某些情况下，您可能希望对其中一个字段显式应用 required=False ，在这种情况下，所需的验证行为是不明确的。

trans-unit.source: By default CSRF validation is not applied when using APIClient. If you need to explicitly enable CSRF validation, you can do so by setting the enforce_csrf_checks flag when instantiating the client.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用 APIClient 时不应用CSRF验证。如果需要显式启用CSRF验证，则可以通过在实例化客户端时设置 enforce_csrf_checks 标志来实现。

trans-unit.source: By default field values are treated as mapping to an attribute on the object. If you need to customize how the field value is accessed and set you need to override .get_attribute() and/or .get_value().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，字段值被视为映射到对象上的属性。如果需要自定义如何访问和设置字段值，则需要重写 .get_attribute() 和/或 .get_value() 。

trans-unit.source: By default hyperlinks are expected to correspond to a view name that matches the style '{model_name}-detail', and looks up the instance by a pk keyword argument.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，超链接应与匹配样式 '{model_name}-detail' 的视图名称相对应，并通过 pk 关键字参数查找实例。

trans-unit.source: By default nested serializers are read-only. If you want to support write-operations to a nested serializer field you'll need to create create() and/or update() methods in order to explicitly specify how the child relationships should be saved.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，嵌套序列化器是只读的。如果要支持对嵌套序列化器字段的写操作，则需要创建 create() 和/或 update() 方法，以便明确指定应如何保存子关系。

trans-unit.source: By default only GET methods will be accepted. Other methods will respond with "405 Method Not Allowed". To alter this behaviour, specify which methods the view allows, like so:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，仅接受 GET 方法。其他方法将响应“ 405方法不允许”。要更改此行为，请指定视图允许的方法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: By default renderer classes are assumed to be using the UTF-8 encoding. To use a different encoding, set the charset attribute on the renderer.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，假定渲染器类使用 UTF-8 编码。要使用其他编码，请在渲染器上设置 charset 属性。

trans-unit.source: By default the ListSerializer class does not support multiple updates. This is because the behavior that should be expected for insertions and deletions is ambiguous.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， ListSerializer 类不支持多个更新。这是因为插入和删除应预期的行为是模棱两可的。

trans-unit.source: By default the URLs created by SimpleRouter are appended with a trailing slash. This behavior can be modified by setting the trailing_slash argument to False when instantiating the router. For example:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，由 SimpleRouter 创建的URL 后面加上斜杠。实例化路由器时，可以通过将 trailing_slash 参数设置为 False 来修改此行为。例如：

trans-unit.source: By default the available formats are 'multipart' and 'json'. For compatibility with Django's existing RequestFactory the default format is 'multipart'.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，可用格式为 'multipart' 和 'json' 。为了与Django现有的 RequestFactory 兼容，默认格式为 'multipart' 。

trans-unit.source: By default the response content will be rendered with the highest priority renderer apart from BrowsableAPIRenderer. If you need to customize this behavior, for example to use HTML as the default return format, but use JSON in the browsable API, you can do so by overriding the get_default_renderer() method. For example:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，响应内容将使用 BrowsableAPIRenderer 之外的优先级最高的渲染器进行渲染。如果您需要自定义此行为，例如使用HTML作为默认返回格式，但在可浏览的API中使用JSON，则可以通过覆盖 get_default_renderer() 方法来实现。例如：

trans-unit.source: By default the serializer will include a url field instead of a primary key field.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，序列化程序将包括 url 字段而不是主键字段。

trans-unit.source: By default there are no permissions or throttling applied to the obtain_auth_token view. If you do wish to apply throttling you'll need to override the view class, and include them using the throttle_classes attribute.
trans-unit.target: 缺省情况下，没有任何权限或限制适用于 obtain_auth_token 视图。如果您确实希望应用限制，则需要覆盖视图类，并使用 throttle_classes 属性将其包括在内。

trans-unit.source: By default this exception results in a response with the HTTP status code "400 Bad Request".
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,这个异常会导致HTTP状态码 "400 Bad Request "的响应。

trans-unit.source: By default this exception results in a response with the HTTP status code "401 Unauthenticated", but it may also result in a "403 Forbidden" response, depending on the authentication scheme in use. See the authentication documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此异常会导致HTTP状态码为“ 401未经身份验证”的响应，但根据所使用的身份验证方案，也可能会导致“ 403 Forbidden”响应。有关更多详细信息，请参见身份验证文档。

trans-unit.source: By default this exception results in a response with the HTTP status code "403 Forbidden".
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,这个异常会导致HTTP状态码 "403 Forbidden "的响应。

trans-unit.source: By default this exception results in a response with the HTTP status code "404 Not Found".
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,这个异常会导致HTTP状态码 "404 Not Found "的响应。

trans-unit.source: By default this exception results in a response with the HTTP status code "405 Method Not Allowed".
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,这个异常会导致HTTP状态码 "405 Method Not Allowed "的响应。

trans-unit.source: By default this exception results in a response with the HTTP status code "406 Not Acceptable".
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,这个异常会导致HTTP状态码 "406 Not Acceptable "的响应。

trans-unit.source: By default this exception results in a response with the HTTP status code "415 Unsupported Media Type".
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,这个异常会导致HTTP状态码 "415 Unsupported Media Type "的响应。

trans-unit.source: By default this exception results in a response with the HTTP status code "429 Too Many Requests".
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,这种异常会导致HTTP状态码 "429 Too Many Requests "的响应。

trans-unit.source: By default this field is read-write, although you can change this behavior using the read_only flag.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此字段是可读写的，尽管您可以使用 read_only 标志更改此行为。

trans-unit.source: By default this implementation expects the hostname to match this simple regular expression:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,这个实现希望主机名能够匹配这个简单的正则表达式。

trans-unit.source: By default this will include the following keys: view, request, args, kwargs.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，它将包括以下键： view ， request ， args ， kwargs 。

trans-unit.source: By default this will include the following keys: view, request, response, args, kwargs.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，它将包括以下键： view ， request ， response ， args ， kwargs 。

trans-unit.source: By default using the pagination classes will cause HTML pagination controls to be displayed in the browsable API. There are two built-in display styles. The PageNumberPagination and LimitOffsetPagination classes display a list of page numbers with previous and next controls. The CursorPagination class displays a simpler style that only displays a previous and next control.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用分页类将导致HTML分页控件显示在可浏览的API中。有两种内置的显示样式。该 PageNumberPagination 和 LimitOffsetPagination 类显示页码与前一个和下一个列表控件。该 CursorPagination 类显示一个简单的风格，只显示前面和后面的控制。

trans-unit.source: By default, all the model fields on the class will be mapped to a corresponding serializer fields.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,类上所有的模型字段都会被映射到相应的序列器字段。

trans-unit.source: By default, relational fields that target a ManyToManyField with a through model specified are set to read-only.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，以指定的 through 模型为目标的 ManyToManyField 的关系字段设置为只读。

trans-unit.source: By default, requests created with APIRequestFactory will not have CSRF validation applied when passed to a REST framework view. If you need to explicitly turn CSRF validation on, you can do so by setting the enforce_csrf_checks flag when instantiating the factory.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用 APIRequestFactory 创建的请求在传递到REST框架视图时不会应用CSRF验证。如果需要显式打开CSRF验证，则可以通过在实例化工厂时设置 enforce_csrf_checks 标志来实现。

trans-unit.source: By default, searches will use case-insensitive partial matches. The search parameter may contain multiple search terms, which should be whitespace and/or comma separated. If multiple search terms are used then objects will be returned in the list only if all the provided terms are matched.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,搜索将使用不区分大小写的部分匹配。搜索参数可以包含多个搜索词,这些搜索词应该用空格和/或逗号分隔。如果使用多个搜索条件,那么只有当所有提供的条件都匹配时,才会在列表中返回对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, serializers must be passed values for all required fields or they will raise validation errors. You can use the partial argument in order to allow partial updates.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，必须为所有必填字段传递序列化器值，否则序列化器会引发验证错误。您可以使用 partial 参数来允许部分更新。

trans-unit.source: By default, the URL pattern is based on the method name, and the URL name is the combination of the ViewSet.basename and the hyphenated method name. If you don't want to use the defaults for either of these values, you can instead provide the url_path and url_name arguments to the @action decorator.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，URL模式基于方法名称，并且URL名称是 ViewSet.basename 和带连字符的方法名称的组合。如果您不想对这两个值使用默认值，则可以向 @action 装饰器提供 url_path 和 url_name 参数。

trans-unit.source: By default, the query parameter is named 'ordering', but this may by overridden with the ORDERING_PARAM setting.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，查询参数被命名为 'ordering' ，但是可以被 ORDERING_PARAM 设置覆盖。

trans-unit.source: By default, the search parameter is named 'search', but this may be overridden with the SEARCH_PARAM setting.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，搜索参数名为 'search' ，但是可以使用 SEARCH_PARAM 设置将其覆盖。

trans-unit.source: By default, versioning is not enabled, and request.version will always return None.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不启用版本控制，并且 request.version 将始终返回 None 。

trans-unit.source: CSRF validation
trans-unit.target: CSRF验证

trans-unit.source: CSRF validation in REST framework works slightly differently to standard Django due to the need to support both session and non-session based authentication to the same views. This means that only authenticated requests require CSRF tokens, and anonymous requests may be sent without CSRF tokens. This behaviour is not suitable for login views, which should always have CSRF validation applied.
trans-unit.target: 由于需要支持对同一视图的基于会话和非会话的认证,REST框架中CSRF验证的工作方式与标准Django略有不同。这意味着只有经过身份验证的请求才需要CSRF令牌,而匿名请求可以在没有CSRF令牌的情况下发送。这种行为不适合登录视图,因为登录视图应该始终应用CSRF验证。

trans-unit.source: Cursor based pagination is more complex than other schemes. It also requires that the result set presents a fixed ordering, and does not allow the client to arbitrarily index into the result set. However it does provide the following benefits:
trans-unit.target: 基于光标的分页比其他方案更复杂。它还要求结果集呈现出固定的顺序,并且不允许客户端对结果集进行任意索引。然而它确实提供了以下好处。

trans-unit.source: Cursor based pagination requires that there is a unique, unchanging ordering of items in the result set. This ordering might typically be a creation timestamp on the records, as this presents a consistent ordering to paginate against.
trans-unit.target: 基于光标的分页要求结果集中的项目有一个唯一的、不变的顺序。这种排序通常可能是记录上的创建时间戳,因为这为分页提供了一个一致的排序。

trans-unit.source: Django REST framework allows you to combine the logic for a set of related views in a single class, called a ViewSet. In other frameworks you may also find conceptually similar implementations named something like 'Resources' or 'Controllers'.
trans-unit.target: Django REST框架允许您在一个称为 ViewSet 的类中将一组相关视图的逻辑组合在一起。在其他框架中，您可能还会发现概念上类似的实现，它们的名称类似于“资源”或“控制器”。

trans-unit.source: Each field in a Form class is responsible not only for validating data, but also for "cleaning" it — normalizing it to a consistent format.

trans-unit.source: Each key in the dictionary will be the field name, and the values will be lists of strings of any error messages corresponding to that field. The non_field_errors key may also be present, and will list any general validation errors. The name of the non_field_errors key may be customized using the NON_FIELD_ERRORS_KEY REST framework setting.
trans-unit.target: 字典中的每个键将是字段名称，值将是与该字段相对应的任何错误消息的字符串列表。该 non_field_errors 键也可能存在，并列出任何一般验证错误。可以使用 NON_FIELD_ERRORS_KEY REST框架设置自定义 non_field_errors 键的名称。

trans-unit.source: For clarity inside your code, we recommend using request.query_params instead of the Django's standard request.GET. Doing so will help keep your codebase more correct and obvious - any HTTP method type may include query parameters, not just GET requests.
